alert.note: Alert for Riverside County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 20 at 1:17PM PST until December 23 at 4:00AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THURSDAY TO 4 AM PST SATURDAY ABOVE 6500 FEET... * WHAT...Wet snow expected above 6500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches at elevations from 6500 to 7500 feet, 3 to 6 inches from 7500 to 8000 feet, and 6 to 12 inches above 8000 feet are expected. * WHERE...Riverside County Mountains. * WHEN...From 6 PM Thursday to 4 AM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For road condition information in California...enter 8 0 0 4 2 7 7 6 2 3 if inside california or 9 1 6 4 5 5 7 6 2 3 if outside California.
